content: these socks are designed as a homage to my mormor my maternal grandmother together with my mother she taught me to knit when i was 5 years old she has through my childhood made me countless sweaters however when she grew older this reversed and i started knitting for her one tradition lasted though every christmas she knitted a pair of socks for each of her grandchildren tucked some money in the toe and placed them under the tree we all loved out knitted socks my plan is to become that kind of grandmother i hope you will find comfort whilst knitting these socks sizes 1 2 3 circumference 18 20 22cm foot length adjustable yarn light fingering weight sample uses crazy zauberball from schoppel wolle 100gr/420m yardage 65gr/273m size 1 gauge in 2 by 2 rib 32 sts/45 row = 10 cm needles 2 5mm dpn s or circular needles for magic loop
